1. Overseas cloud storage support.
2. Solve the small problem of intercom voice.
3. Fix the problem that there is no sound in video recording in some cases.
4. Fix the problem that the alarm graph does not display occasionally.
5. Fix the problem that there is no sound when playing the playback video in gateway.
6. Optimize the recording UI logic of cloud video TF card.
7. Remove the percentage loading icon and use the previous circle loading icon.
8. TF capacity optimization only displays the percentage of remaining capacity.
9. The equipment scan code adds distribution network optimization.
